resources.string: Twixter is an app that allows you to interact with Twitter via text while giving the appearance that you\'re browsing normally. You can see how many texts you\'ve used today on the homepage.

Select the action you\'d like to take on the homepage. Type your tweet, message, or search keyword - then hit send. Twixter will send your message on your behalf. If you searched for a term or clicked on feed, you\'ll be able to see the tweets you requested.
How many results do you want?

Twitter is a popular social media app. Users can share their thoughts in \"tweets,\" or snippets of thoughts that are less than 140 characters. There are almost one billion accounts on Twitter, and many celebrities, public figures, experts and politicians are active Twitter users.

A hashtag is a label (usually in the form \"#popularTermHere\") that makes it easy for Twitter users to find tweets about popular topics in the world right now. These hashtags are embedded inside of tweets. Anyone can start a hashtag, and you can search for tweets that include a hashtag in the Search menu.
Sent from your Twilio trial account -
